issue.title: [Java] Fix Javadoc generation bugs with JDK8
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1913](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1913). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
While trying to cut the release candidate, the source release script fails due to various new Javadoc issues

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1913?focusedCommentId=16286366) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
These issues weren't caught in CI because we're only building the docs with JDK7 which doesn't have the documentation linting feature
